divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home, and I saw a bright green light fly across the sky fasterthan I have ever seen anything fly across the sky before. Within about 2seconds it had dissappeared over the horizon!
trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were no other sightings in Toronto on or around February 17th 2002
Summary: Green Light Shooting Across the Sky
